EasyXLS.Charts

Class ExcelSeries

  • System.Object
    • EasyXLS.Drawings.DrawingObject
      • EasyXLS.Drawings.LineDrawingObject
        • EasyXLS.Drawings.FillDrawingObject
          • EasyXLS.Drawings.EffectDrawingObject
            • EasyXLS.Charts.ExcelSeries
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEffectDrawingObject

    public class ExcelSeries
extends EffectDrawingObject
    This class stores the series information like values, name, fill settings, line settings, shadow settings, data labels type, legend key visibility next to label, marker type. A chart can have multiple series.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExcelSeries()
      Defines an instance of the excel series.
      ExcelSeries(System.String seriesName, System.String seriesValues)
      Defines an instance of the excel series that has the name and the values defined.
